name: Medved Hellraiser
description:
The year is 2050. A businessman named Elon Musk has seized power and is going to subdue all of humanity with his Star Dick system. It is entrusted to exercise control over humanity to its faithful henchmen: aliens, homeless people and housing and communal services workers. However, there was a brave hero who decided to challenge the villain and stop him. His name is Bear Hellraiser! Taking his faithful fiery ax (Ax of St. Pigidius), the hero goes to administer justice!
A fun first-person shooter with funny bosses, a variety of weapons, sounds and dialogues.

Features:

Kill enemies with three mighty weapons: Magic Axe, Shotgun, Musket-Grenade Launcher!
Nice graphics.
Funny bosses.
Crazy sounds.
Interesting quests.
